traits.Horrid Gnashing: The nullifier's mouths gnash incoherently while it can see any enemies. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the nullifier and can hear it must make a DC 16+1d8 + 12 Wisdom saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the creature rolls a d8 to determine what it does during the current turn:
traits.Magic Resistance: The nullifier has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: The nullifier makes three attacks: one with its bites and two with its claws.
actions.Bites: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d8 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) force damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d8 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) force damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16+1d8 + 12) if it's a creature. The nullifier has two claws, each of which can grapple one creature.
